translation:
Most Excellent Sir

Cruz Alta, July 9, 1839.

Bound by gratitude for the kindnesses of Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency

From Your Excellency Antônio de Melo e Albuquerque

Received and responded to on the 18th.

To the most excellent citizen Senhor Domingos José de Almeida. Distinguished Minister of Finance. Caçapava.

Santa Maria
